mapper.select: select comp_id companyId,full_name supplier, link_man linkMan,link_tel linkTel,detail_address address from t_uc_company where full_name like concat('%',#{roughName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
select name linkMan,mobile linkTel,detail_address address from t_warehouse_linkman where wh_id =#{whId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
